SEARCH
Package mru.game.view

Class AppMenu

java.lang.Object
mru.game.view.AppMenu
public class AppMenu extends Object
This class is the menu display class for the main and sub menus

    • showMainMenu

      public String showMainMenu()
      This method displays the Main menu and prompts user for an input to choose where to go next
      Returns:
      a string in lower case that represents the choice of the player

    • showSearchMenu

      public String showSearchMenu()
      This method displays the a sub menu to search for the top players or a specific player and prompts user for an input to choose where to go next
      Returns:
      a string in lower case that represents the choice of the player

    • showAskName

      public String showAskName()
      This method displays a question asking for the name of the searched player and prompts user for an input to enter there name
      Returns:
      the name of the user in lower case

      public void showSearchTopLabel()
      This method displays the top users in descending order
      Parameters:
      playerList - all the player sorted in the amount of wins in descending order

    • showWelcomeNewUser

      public void showWelcomeNewUser(Player user)
      This method displays a greeting and shows the balance of the new player
      Parameters:
      user - the current new player object that previously did not exist in the database
